questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to declare Kabwe District a free trade zone so as to attract investors;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

(c) what the estimated cost of the project is.
(a) what the rationale for the increase in tuition fees at technical and vocational colleges, countrywide, is; and
(b) what measures are being taken to ensure that the new fees do not disadvantage students from poor families.
